scripts.build: npm run build:prompts && bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && (python3 -m build 2>/dev/null || pyproject-build) || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:rust:wasm: cd rust && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg/web
scripts.test:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo test || echo 'Rust tests skipped'
scripts.lint:rust: cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged -- -D warnings && cargo fmt
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest -p no:anchorpy --asyncio-mode=auto || echo 'Python tests skipped'
scripts.lint:python: cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format .
scripts.lint:python:fix: cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format .

EVM_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Hex-encoded private key (starting with 0x) used by the WalletProvider to sign transactions.

ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_ETHEREUM.description: Custom RPC URL for Ethereum mainnet. For other chains, set ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_<CHAINNAME> (or EVM_PROVIDER_<CHAINNAME>) in your .env.

ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_BASE.description: Custom RPC URL for Base mainnet.

ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_ARBITRUM.description: Custom RPC URL for Arbitrum One.

ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_OPTIMISM.description: Custom RPC URL for Optimism mainnet.

TEE_MODE.description: Controls whether Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) mode is enabled.

WALLET_SECRET_SALT.description: Salt value for TEE-derived wallet keypair.

SEPOLIA_RPC_URL.description: RPC endpoint URL for Sepolia testnet.

BASE_SEPOLIA_RPC_URL.description: RPC endpoint URL for Base Sepolia testnet.
